Conquering Europe with multi-lingual Joomla

12 November 2008 by Johan

Web integrator One-Company Interactieve Communicatie recently delivered their first Nooku Content website. Minihouse, One-Company’s client, is a European software company, focused on providing custom solutions for importing and exporting activities. They chose to implemented Nooku Content, to reach both Dutch and English-speaking customers and prospects.

Nooku Content 0.5.5 released

04 November 2008 by Johan

What’s going on for Nooku Content ? We released v0.5.5 last week to our partners, and things are looking good. This is just a small maintenance release, which fixes some leftover bugs. In the meantime, an incredible amount of work has gone into v0.6.0.

Doing 0.5.x releases while taking our time to work on 0.6, is a great way to offer stability to our users....

29 September 2008 by Johan

At the beginning of the month we announced our survey results from our August survey. One of the most interesting feedback we received was the request for better search engine optimization and search engine friendly URL support in Nooku Content.
